messages.subject: This is what happens...
messages.msgSnippet: ... when you start googling new key words... like Kojima Family. Have we run into this site before?  What a surprise to bring up a Shinsengumi site while
messages.messageBody:
... when you start googling new key words... like Kojima Family.

Have we run into this site before? What a surprise to bring up a Shinsengumi site while searching for Kojima. Doubt it's the same family, but I'm just getting started.

http://www.tourism.metro.tokyo.jp/english/winter2/shinsen/

phil (who didn't need more things to procrastinate with)


---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Friends. Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo! Messenger

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
